section.title: Removing Users
section.para: When a user account is no longer required, remove it from Red Hat Virtualization.

step.para: Click the Users tab to display the list of authorized users.
Select the user to be removed. Ensure the user is not running any virtual machines.
Click the Remove button. A message displays prompting you to confirm the removal. Click OK.

section.para: The user is removed from Red Hat Virtualization, but not from the external directory.
